body:
I would like to thank Axel Jacobs for hosting the Curtin Universities
Knoppix/Linux/Radiance iso image at his website -
http://luminance.londonmet.ac.uk/ or directly at
http://luminance.londonmet.ac.uk/curtin/


This level of cooperation within the radiance community is very much
appreciated and while the LEANRIX and the CURTIN images overlap as far
as radiance is concerned, they provide different entry paths/journeys
for the new user to embark in learning/experiencing this remarkable
software.




Regards 


Terry Mc Minn
Faculty of Built Environment, Art and Design
Curtin University of Technology
GPO Box U 1987 Perth 6845 Western Australia
Email: T.Mcminn at curtin.edu.au
CRICOS Provider Code: 00301J
